title: KIM SWITCH / DOOMED
description: After breaking down the back door in the bookstore you and Kim discover yourself in a gym.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's a gym," he disagrees. "Th..."
links.text: "No, it's a gym," he disagrees. "Though it looks like no one's been here in ages..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I doubt the electricity still work..."
links.text: "I doubt the electricity still works... Good thing we have a flashlight on us."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I doubt the electricity still work..."
links.text: "I doubt the electricity still works... Good thing we have a flashlight on us. Don't forget to take it out of your bag before we move on."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I doubt the electricity still work..."
links.text: "I doubt the electricity still works... We should find a flashlight if we want to go on. There should be one in my Kineema."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Some specks of dust shimmer in a fa..."
links.text: Some specks of dust shimmer in a faint beam of daylight falling from the window. Other than that, the room is dark.

links.title: Inland Empire: "An eerie feeling rises in your ches..."
links.text: An eerie feeling rises in your chest...

links.title: You: ""What if there's a *reason* why no..."
links.text: "What if there's a *reason* why no one's been here for ages..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, because it's *closed*...""
links.text: "Yes, because it's *closed*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to look for *supra-natural..."
links.text: "No need to look for *supra-natural* explanations where a banal one will do. Now, let's move on, shall we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to look for *supra-natural..."
links.text: "No need to look for *supra-natural* explanations where a banal one will do. Now, let's go get the flashlight, shall we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, let's move on, shall we?""
links.text: "Now, let's move on, shall we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, let's go get the flashlight,..."
links.text: "Now, let's go get the flashlight, shall we?"

links.title: You: ""Let's just keep going, I'm sure it..."
links.text: "Let's just keep going, I'm sure it's just a regular abandoned house, nothing mysterious here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sounds good.""
links.text: "Sounds good."

links.title: You: ""Let's go get the flashlight then.""
links.text: "Let's go get the flashlight then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Some specks of dust shimmer in a ra..."
links.text: Some specks of dust shimmer in a ray of streetlight falling from the window. Other than that, the room is dark.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""It's the netherworld. Beyond the v..."
You: ""Looks like a gym to me.""

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, but no one's been here in age..."
links.text: "Yes, but no one's been here in ages." He draws a stripe on the dusty floor with his foot...

dialogueTree.title: You: ""No idea, Kim... but my head hurts...."
dialogueTree.text: "No idea, Kim... but my head hurts... my head hurts *bad*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You didn't *have* to ram the door..."
links.text: "You didn't *have* to ram the door down, you know..." He looks around. "No one's been here for ages."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We don't *have to* explore an aban..."
links.text: "We don't *have to* explore an abandoned gym, you know. Besides, no one's been here in ages..."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I think this may be the Artemitep'..."
dialogueTree.text: "I think this may be the Artemitep's Boxing Club For Young Athletes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think you're right," he says. "T..."
links.text: "I think you're right," he says. "Though it looks like no one's been here in ages..."
